metadata.title: CVE-2018-17436 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: ReadCode() in decompress.c in the HDF HDF5 through 1.10.3 library allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (invalid write access) via a craftedHDF5 file. This issue was triggered while converting a GIF file to an HDFfile.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
